price: دوى كه (رښتیني) معبودان وى، هلته (جهنم ته) به نه وو ورننوتلي، او دا ټول به تل پكې پراته وي.
arabic: لَوۡ كَانَ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ ءَالِهَةٗ مَّا وَرَدُوهَاۖ وَكُلّٞ فِيهَا خَٰلِدُونَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: law kāna hāulāi ālihatan mā waradūhā wakullun fīhā khālidūna
